That's a great concern! Habitica can be a fantastic tool for habit tracking, but it's essential to use it in a way that doesn't contribute to excessive screen time or social media usage. Here are some tips to help you limit your Habitica usage to 30 minutes a day:

1. **Set a timer**: Set a timer on your phone or watch for 30 minutes when you open Habitica. This will help you stay focused and avoid mindless scrolling.
2. **Schedule Habitica time**: Allocate a specific time of the day for Habitica, such as during your morning or evening routine. This will help you develop a habit of using the app at the same time every day and avoid checking it constantly.
3. **Use Habitica's built-in features**: Habitica has a "Focus Mode" that allows you to set a timer for a specific amount of time (e.g., 30 minutes) and locks you out of the app until the timer expires. You can also set a "Daily Limit" to restrict your daily usage.
4. **Remove notifications**: Turn off notifications for Habitica to avoid constant reminders to check the app. You can also set your phone to "Do Not Disturb" mode during your scheduled Habitica time to minimize distractions.
5. **Use a browser extension or website blocker**: Tools like Freedom, SelfControl, or StayFocusd can block access to Habitica or other distracting websites during certain times of the day or for a set period.
6. **Set a daily goal**: Challenge yourself to complete a specific task or habit within the 30-minute time frame. This will help you stay focused and motivated, and you'll feel a sense of accomplishment when you're done.
7. **Log out when you're done**: Make it a habit to log out of Habitica when you've completed your daily tasks. This will help you avoid mindless browsing and reduce the temptation to check the app excessively.
8. **Use a physical habit tracker**: Consider using a physical habit tracker or journal in addition to Habitica. This will give you an alternative way to track your habits and provide a break from screen time.

By implementing these strategies, you can enjoy the benefits of Habitica while maintaining a healthy balance and limiting your screen time.

Remember, it's essential to be kind to yourself and flexible when setting boundaries. If you find it challenging to stick to your 30-minute limit, adjust your approach as needed. The goal is to develop a healthy relationship with Habitica and make it a positive tool for your habit-tracking journey.
